name: Breadsticks
description: Add to your pasta or pizza order for tasty crispy-on-the-outside, soft-on-the-inside bread sticks.

name: Cheese Sticks
description: Cheese sticks come sprinkled with flavorful Italian seasoning and a cup of our delicious marinara sauce.

name: Fries
description: Crispy fries always make a welcome addition to any of our wing meals.
